data.title: Jeffrey Combs Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Jeffrey Combs on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Jeffrey Combs including Batman: The Doom That Came to Gotham, Would You Raâ¦
data.text:
The Black Queen

When the BAU goes to San Jose to investigate a string of murders, Garcia delves into her hacker past and reconnects with her old flame to help the team with the case.

Red Hood

Following several bank robberies, Gordon and Bullock investigate the Red Hood gang. Selina Kyle continues to bond with Barbara; and Fish Mooney tries to reclaim her position in the underworld.

Everyone Has a Cobblepot

While Gordon seeks information about the recent controversy with Commissioner Loeb Fish's allegiance with the prisoners is questioned when she appears to join forces with Dr. Dulmacher (guest star Colm Feore). Meanwhile after an attack close to home Bruce deals with the aftermath.

What You Leave Behind, Part 1

The war against the Dominion reaches its final confrontation when Sisko leads the Federation Alliance in an attempt to invade the Cardassian homeworld.
